title: Denman Large 9 Row Styling Brush with Nylon Pins (D4)
description: Denman Large 9 Row Styling Brush with Nylon Pins (D4)Large styling brush with 9 rows of nylon pins. The famous Denman anti-static rubber pad provides maximum grip and control during blow-drying for shaping hair. Ideal for thicker, longer hair!

title: Hair Flair Deluxe Softhood Hair Dryer Attachment
description: The Hair Flair Deluxe Softhood Hair Dryer Attachment attaches to the vast majority of hand-held hair dryers.
